statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT request_id, requester_name FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT request_description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE requester_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT request_description, requester_name FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY request_date DESC
SELECT requester_name, request_date FROM maintenance_requests ORDER BY requester_name ASC, request_date DESC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE requester_name = 'John Doe' OR requester_name = 'Jane Smith'
SELECT request_id, request_description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE LENGTH(request_description) > 50 LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT request_details, request_date FROM maintenance_requests WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT worker_id, cost, work_start_date FROM work_orders ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date >= '2021-01-01' AND request_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT request_id, request_date, worker_id FROM maintenance_requests INNER JOIN work_orders ON maintenance_requests.request_id = work_orders.request_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date > '2022-01-01' AND employee_id = 100;
SELECT request_id, request_date, request_details FROM maintenance_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM work_orders WHERE worker_id = 200 AND cost > 1000 ORDER BY work_start_date ASC;
SELECT request_id, COUNT(work_order_id) AS total_work_orders FROM work_orders GROUP BY request_id HAVING COUNT(work_order_id) > 2;
SELECT request_id, AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM work_orders GROUP BY request_id HAVING AVG(cost) > 500;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT request_id, request_date, facility_id FROM maintenance_requests WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT schedule_id, facility_id, schedule_date, time_start, time_end FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE facility_id = 5;
SELECT order_id, request_id, schedule_id, assigned_person FROM work_orders WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC, request_id;
SELECT facility_id, COUNT(*) FROM maintenance_schedules GROUP BY facility_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT request_id, schedule_id, status FROM work_orders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY schedule_id, request_id;
SELECT facility_id, schedule_date, time_start, time_end FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01' AND schedule_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT request_id, description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE facility_id = 101;
SELECT facility_id, request_id FROM maintenance_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT facility_id, COUNT(request_id) AS request_count FROM maintenance_requests GROUP BY facility_id;
SELECT * FROM facilities WHERE department = 'Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT request_date, description FROM maintenance_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT facility_id, scheduled_date, notes FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT facility_id, location FROM facilities WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY location;
SELECT order_id, assigned_worker_id, completion_date FROM work_orders WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT request_description, request_date FROM maintenance_requests WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT schedule_name, start_date, end_date FROM schedules WHERE employee_id = 5 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT work_order_id, status FROM work_orders WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT request_id, request_description, equipment_id FROM maintenance_requests WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT e.employee_name, w.status, s.schedule_name FROM employees e JOIN work_orders w ON e.employee_id = w.work_order_id JOIN schedules s ON w.schedule_id = s.schedule_id;
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT r.request_description, w.status, e.employee_name FROM maintenance_requests r JOIN work_orders w ON r.request_id = w.request_id JOIN employees e ON w.employee_id = e.employee_id ORDER BY r.request_date ASC;
